ThoughtDef.label: ate raw food
ThoughtDef.description: I had to eat raw food. Can't we cook it, or at least synthesize some nutrient paste?

ThoughtDef.label: ate nutrient paste
ThoughtDef.description: I had to eat nutrient paste. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.

ThoughtDef.label: ate fine meal
ThoughtDef.description: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!

ThoughtDef.label: ate lavish meal
ThoughtDef.description: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.

ThoughtDef.label: raw cannibalism
ThoughtDef.description: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. This is a nightmare.

ThoughtDef.label: cooked cannibalism
ThoughtDef.description: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. This is horrible.

ThoughtDef.label: raw cannibalism
ThoughtDef.description: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. It was so... succulent.

ThoughtDef.label: cooked cannibalism
ThoughtDef.description: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. So pleasurable. If only I had some fava beans and a nice chianti.

ThoughtDef.label: butchered humanoid
ThoughtDef.description: I just butchered someone up like an animal.

ThoughtDef.label: ate off the ground
ThoughtDef.description: I had to eat a meal off the ground. Can't we get a table around here?

ThoughtDef.label: observed corpse
ThoughtDef.description: I saw a dead body laying on the ground.

ThoughtDef.label: observed rotting corpse
ThoughtDef.description: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. It was disgusting.

ThoughtDef.label: witnessed ally's death
ThoughtDef.description: I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.

ThoughtDef.label: witnessed stranger's death
ThoughtDef.description: I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.

ThoughtDef.label: witnessed stranger's death
ThoughtDef.description: I saw someone die! That was intense!

ThoughtDef.label: killed someone
ThoughtDef.description: I killed someone! What a rush!

ThoughtDef.label: wounded
ThoughtDef.description: That's my blood! I've been wounded in a fight!

ThoughtDef.label: new colony optimism
ThoughtDef.description: We just landed here. It's a tough situation, but I'm excited to be founding a new colony.

ThoughtDef.label: new colony hope
ThoughtDef.description: I'm getting used to this, but it's still an exciting new situation. I hope this works out...

ThoughtDef.label: slept outside
ThoughtDef.description: I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements.

ThoughtDef.label: slept on ground
ThoughtDef.description: I had to sleep on the ground like an animal.

ThoughtDef.label: a prisoner was beaten
ThoughtDef.description: They're beating a prisoner.

ThoughtDef.label: a prisoner was sold
ThoughtDef.description: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.

ThoughtDef.label: a prisoner was executed
ThoughtDef.description: A prisoner was executed in cold blood. This colony seems more evil by the day.

ThoughtDef.label: just imprisoned
ThoughtDef.description: I just got thrown in a prison. I'd better keep myself together and deal with this.

ThoughtDef.label: convinced by warden
ThoughtDef.description: That warden and I had a talk about the colony. It sounds like a good place...

ThoughtDef.label: beaten by warden
ThoughtDef.description: That warden just beat me up. He didn't break anything but, damn, it hurts.

ThoughtDef.label: beaten viciously by warden
ThoughtDef.description: That warden just beat the hell from me. I could die from this...

ThoughtDef.label: had social chat
ThoughtDef.description: I just had a good chat with someone.

ThoughtDef.label: had an unpleasant conversation
ThoughtDef.description: Someone was rude to me. The worst part is, I don't even think that person realized it...

ThoughtDef.label: sowed a plant
ThoughtDef.description: What the world needs is more plants!
